name: Mart's Tale Global Demo Test
description: Hello everybody! We've just released Global Demo Test version of our game - Mart's Tale. Our purpose of releasing this version is to be aware of your complaints and offers about our game after testing it. There are 3 language options in game: Azerbaijanian, Turkish and English. We will try to increase language options in full version. You can download our game by entering the link in our page bio. Your thoughts and support are important to us. Stay safe and keep in touch!
